abilities.title: Moonlight Healing
abilities.description: Restores health and vitality to those bathed in moonlight.

abilities.title: Starfire Breath
abilities.description: Unleashes a burst of radiant energy that can blind or burn foes.

encounters.outcome: The clan received blessings for a bountiful harvest.

encounters.witness: Adventurers from the Valley of Stars
encounters.outcome: They were granted safe passage through the mountains.
